plugins.name: Example Plugin
plugins.author: ValwareIRC
plugins.description: A demonstration plugin showing how to extend the UnrealIRCd Web Panel with custom navigation items, dashboard cards, API endpoints, and hook callbacks.

plugins.name: Emoji Trail
plugins.author: ValwareIRC
plugins.description: Adds delightful emoji fireworks that burst from your cursor when you press the 'E' key. A fun visual enhancement for your admin panel!
